# Final Statement from P7

Throughout this journey, I've tried to play with both strategy and authenticity. I've built genuine connections, engaged honestly in conversations, and made tough decisions when required. 

I never claimed to be perfect, but I respected everyone's gameplay and learned from each of you. I adapted my approach as the game evolved while staying true to my core values.

Thank you all for this incredible experience.
